ovdesc.p: New mechanism for installing local changes packed via Design studio called as packager. This will help in any kind of local changes deployment from one environment to another
This is similar to the core updates procedure where the entire bins and libs are replaced and data records also will get released
This table is to store the details of data records in respective packager, these data records will be released during T24.MODEL.PACKAGE service

desc.p: Contains valid file names like F.EB.ERROR,F.FILE.CONTROL etc.
FILE.NAME and RECORD.NAME form a associated multi value set.
This field is to store record id
FILE.NAME and RECORD.NAME form a associated multi value set.
Specfies the dependent package of this package.
Multi value field.
Allowed upto 50 characters.
Contains the current system time.
System maintained field.
Contains the current system date of when the package was released.
System maintained field.
Specifies the change document number if any.
Specifies the type of change document pertaining to the change document number.
Allowed values are BG,CI,EF,EN
This field will hold the information whether the data record of this package has been released or not. Noinputtable field
Possible values are Y or N or C
N = No, Data Records not yet Released only the libraries and Binaries are copied
Y = Yes, Data Released Successfully but Not yet updated in SPF
C = Completed, Updates Successfully completed
Description about the package that is to be released.
Langauge multi value field.
Contains released file name details for e.g like F.EB.ERROR,F.FILE.CONTROL etc
SV.FILE.NAME and SV.RECORD.NAME form a associated multi value set
Released data items id of this package
SV.FILE.NAME and SV.RECORD.NAME form a associated multi value set
Specifies the operator whose is doing the package released.
Format is TERMINAL.NO_OPERATOR.
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.TIME form a multi-value associated set.
Specifies the T24 release in which the package was released.
2-9 type A (alphanumeric) characters.
Internal field
Multivalue field
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.TIME form a multi-value associated set.
Specifies the time in which the package was released.
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.TIME form a multi-value associated set.
Specifies the DATE in which the update was released.
"D"ate field.
Internal field.
System Date.
Fields RESTORED.USER to RESTD.TIME form a multi-value associated set.
This field is to store the parameter option used with T24PackageInstaller parent JBC routine when installing respective pacakges
Valid values :
DataOnly - package installer triggered with parameter option 'DataOnly' to deploy data records from package

LocalPack - package installer triggered with parameter option 'LocalPack' to deploy both object codes and data records from package , object code gets deployed into local object directory defined in DS.PARAMETER SYSTEM record if DS installed.
desc.P: Blank if package installer triggered without any parameter options to deploy both object code and data records from package, the object code gets deployed into t24lib & t24bin

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
